data.actual_result: It's colour almost completely matches to it's surroundings on dark theme whereas it can be easily seen on light theme.
data.expected_result: It's in a colour that can be seen on dark theme.
data.short_description: The magifying glass in the share screen is almost completely invisible on dark theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to dark theme. - Share something from your gallery to Discord. - Observe the magnifying glass in the share screen.
